website_summaries.verdict: Aside from a few minor quirks, this hand truck earns our highest marks for its solid construction and ability to live up to its rated weight capacity.
pros: Rated to hold 500 pounds in upright position and 1,000 pounds when used in the platform position
Has 10-inch front tires and 61-inch height that make it suitable for moving large, heavy items
Popular brand often used by professional movers, known for top-notch quality
cons: Some packages arrived with missing hardware

customer_reviews.title: I would like to have the most recent broken hand truck replaced
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased around 5 of the magliner hand trucks from amazon and at least three or four of them have broken at different points on the hand truck, which leads me believe these are not authentic magliner. I have been in the trucking industry for almost 20 years and have always used magliner brand and I have not experienced them breaking like this until I purchased from this company listed on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: So I've been on the fence about buying this magliner cart but i went on and made the purchase, well as i read from another review that it came when it said it would BUT! after opening the box and start assembling it. it was missing parts well GD i needed to use the cart at work ASAP but i can't so i called Magliner directly and they were kind enough to send me the two missing parts for free right away instead of going through Amazon. so if you buy this cart expect to have missing parts. ( don't waste your time going through Amazon to get the missing parts)
customer_reviews.author: Map

customer_reviews.title: Opens and closes easily. If there was anything I would do different ...
customer_reviews.text: As a General Contractor we move a lot of tools daily. I have had various carts over the years, but none with the quality of the Magline. Well constructed, fairly light for its size. Opens and closes easily. If there was anything I would do different I should have verified the height. Its about a foot taller than what I expected so its a little hard to fit in my van however the extra length does come in handy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Cornair

customer_reviews.title: American made quality cart.
customer_reviews.text: Magliner carts are beyond comparison to similar products. The build quality, materials & design will give you a industrial class product that offers up year after year of trouble free service. Worth every penny but be sure to secure it with a cable lock when not in use ... We use them in the entertainment industry and have lost two over the past decade or so due to theft on a show site. Funny thing is, lesser quality carts (home center quality) are left alone, even a thief appreciates the difference. These carts are worth buying ... Superior American materials, design & build.
customer_reviews.author: TStech

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality Convertble Hand Truck
customer_reviews.text: Needed a convertible hand truck to transport stage and sound equipment in and out of a cargo trailer. Shopping criteria was it had to be 100% reliable. Already familiar with Magline quality, it was a clear choice, absolutely no regrets. Some assembly is required but if you have some basic hand tools, no problem. There was a minor manufacturing issue but a brief email to Gemini customer service and a replacement part was promptly sent and worked perfectly, A+ customer service. The hand truck converts to platform in seconds, is heavy duty throughout and unlike similar products, there are no plastic parts at stress points, should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Elder

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR QUALITY Gemini Sr hand truck
customer_reviews.text: After more than 30 years delivery experience, using various hand trucks, Magliner has always been THE BEST equipment. It will perform better and last longer, making it worth every penny. Before my last apartment move, I decided to purchase one for my personal use. You can move ten times the boxes in one trip, reducing move time and saving your back. I highly recommend investing in a product that will live up to its reputation. MAGLINER is my only choice.
customer_reviews.author: s hite

customer_reviews.title: If you need a hand truck.  This is your best bet.
customer_reviews.text: We now have three of these hand trucks and they are incredibly durable and maneuverable. If I had a critique of this item it would be that the tires are inflatable. On all three of our hand trucks we have replaced the pneumatic wheels with solid rubber tires. A fully loaded hand truck with a flat tire is difficult to use at best. This is an exceptional tool for anyone needing to move large loads in tight spaces. Very functional and easy to collapse and store. The vendor shipped to Alaska quicker than you would believe. Five stars is not enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite possibly the last hand truck you'll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: Magliner has been building professional/commercial duty hand trucks for many years. They are manufactured in the USA (Standish, MI in fact) and for the money this is a great value. The box arrived on time and intact. Some assembly is required and you will need basic hand tools. Assembly was straightforward and took less than 20 minutes. One thing to note is that this truck is TALL. And when you convert it to its 4-wheel function you'll notice it has quite the bed for carrying a lot of .... stuff. Very, very pleased with this hand truck.
customer_reviews.author: Licensed Aquaculture Facility

customer_reviews.title: My New Big Helper
customer_reviews.text: No longer lugging things to the curb. One trip for the groceries. I got the Magline 301645 Aluminum Detachable Deck for it too. We at one point invented the wheel, I am going to use it. Its longer than the one I had at work for odd jobs. I am going to put the few parts that need some assembly this weekend and test it out. This product based on the one I used at work is going to an asset.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best. I bought this in 2/12/17. No problems what so ever. I overload this hand truck daily I a union floor Installer and put this tool through hell . Going over all different types of surfaces to get tools from truck to jobsite.
customer_reviews.author: John Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Best Convertible Hand Truck
customer_reviews.text: We used this at our last conference, moving boxes from car to booth. Fantastic time savings and ease. We saw some like it, but many people wanted to know where we got this one. It's aluminum so lightweight. We loaded it up over 300 lb and it was nothing. Very happy customer. It's not cheap, but probably a good value for what you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Welch

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Built like a tank with quality. Magnesium parts where it counts. Assembly instructions are terrible but I won't deduct a star for that since anyone with a mechanical bone in their body should be able to put it together regardless of the crappy instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Heavy as hell and too large for normal van or truck
customer_reviews.text: gigantic as hell, terrible in standard mode its amazing as convertible tho. Get the handles cause single bar is complete trash. Assembly is pain in the ass too. Sharp edges cut your hand and its way too heavy. Magliner dropped the ball on this one. Their other dollys are the best tho. I used to deliver beer kegs and cases
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Magliners are the best handtrucks. We use them daily at our business, so it is worth paying a little more for a good quality product. We like the flat free tires better, but we can always swap the tires. Fast shipping and decent packaging. Easy to assemble. We are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Valcarce

customer_reviews.title: Missing holes to assemble properly
customer_reviews.text: The item came and it requires assembly but this was much harder because one of the holes wasn’t punched out correctly (see pictures). Disappointing it was shipped this way.
customer_reviews.author: TDensmore

customer_reviews.title: Good dolly but mechanism can be a pain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this exact same dolly over 5 years ago and it has been OK the locking mechanism didnt work anymore and it became difficult to fold up and down so we decided it was time for a new one. Unfortunately this one came with the locking mechanism already faulty it only locks away maybe 10% of the time on the first swing. It also came WITHOUT INSTRUCTIONS and alot of pieces to put together! For $300 you really do expect more.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I love my cart and I use it every week at the Farmer's Market to haul crates of produce for my restaurant.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Sturdy, easy to handle. It took a few times to get the hang of unfolding the arms/wheels but once you do it is super. Heavy unit, but when you roll it, it glides smooth as can be. And the aluminum means i wont rust out like the older non folding unit I bought at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Dean  G

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand Truck Ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this, I have gotten the most compliments off my hand truck. I have gotten my money worth and then some. Best investment ever. Yes, I would recommend and have been recommending this product to anyone that asks.
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: Serious quality, and usability.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a tank. Judging by the materials and construction, this hand truck will serve well past my own years. The latching mechanism for the platform truck wheels is solid. One word of caution for casual hand truck users ... despite the description, this tank is *not* lightweight. It may be so compared to other professional quality hand trucks, but compared to the typical rig, it is undoubtedly a heavyweight. However, it is extremely well engineered, balanced, and maneuverable, which makes the weight mostly a non-issue. I highly recommend this product for anyone who is looking for serious quality, and usability.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane Hill

customer_reviews.title: Mag liner works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Used to move new appliances into the house and worked perfectly. Very sturdy, strong, and makes moving things safer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for work. I was told it was the best I could buy. Within a week some of the welds started cracking and one of the wheels fell off. I would not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT J SHUBIN

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Pretty easy to put together, although having a second set of hands makes it much easier to line parts up and tighten, etc. Like suggested in their manual: make sure you re-tighten everything after a few uses. I haven't had it terribly long, but it has gone though a harsh winter and shows no signs of wear and tear. Also, its very easy to covert it to a dolly type product to a 'cart' and vice versa...(its a little awkward as a dolly, but nothing to be worried about) I would definitely recommend this product; worth the higher price point.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Should have taken into consideration weight of hand truck especially with accessories. Instructions are not so good. But other than that, it is super sturdy and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: YoYo Zit

customer_reviews.title: simply the best
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a bomber Hand Truck this is it. I use it for work and the investment is well worth every penny compared to the cheap imitations.
customer_reviews.author: ssort

customer_reviews.title: Feels Solid and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived new in original packaging but was missing a big bolt for the bottom bracket. Had to go to a hardware store and buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: andrey1993

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but no assembly instructions. Fortunately I had another set already assembled to go by.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dolly! I bought this for hubby for Father's ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dolly! I bought this for hubby for Father's Day. He LOVES it. The dolly is very sturdy and can really haul a load!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is strong and easy to maneuver doing deliveries in an office building
customer_reviews.author: Chevyman

customer_reviews.title: Works great but in instruction manual.
customer_reviews.text: This is the brand we have always bought for my husbands business. The only problem with this order is it would have been great if instructions would have been sent with it
customer_reviews.author: honkysdream

customer_reviews.title: great well built cart
customer_reviews.text: Great cart, use it every day on a little Debbie delivery route. Thing takes a beating and holds up amazing in all weather conditions. 4 years and still moves as new with daily heavy use. Have purchased 2 from amazon for different routes parts are cheap and easy to replace but I have yet need to replace any
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Magliner not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived taped up and the box was falling apart and the instructions were missing. Ive been using Magliners for many years and the quality just isn't what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tires not hold air  Mechanism for Convertible damaged will not hold
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 4 of the Magliner hand trucks on June 21 2019. . After 1 1/2 months (past the month allowed to return to Amazon) one of the hand trucks tires will no longer hold air and mechanism for convertible is damaged and will not hold. What recourse do we have?
customer_reviews.author: A Renau

customer_reviews.title: One tough hand truck
customer_reviews.text: Its a Magliner. Still the best brand. Converted to a full time four wheel cart with shelf for video production and saved hundreds
customer_reviews.author: ENLIGHTENED IMAGES

customer_reviews.title: The price might scare you off, but don't let ...
customer_reviews.text: The price might scare you off, but don't let it. This hand truck will last forever. I have worked in film and broadcasting for decades and Magline is always the hand truck of choice on set. I have used 10+ year old magliners that are as stable as the day they were made. Spend the extra money. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Tire leaking
customer_reviews.text: We love the dolly but the tire is leaking air so not sure what we should do because we can’t return it
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered different wheels not the pneumatic wheels, and I had ordered the business lettering and I didn’t get those either
customer_reviews.author: don harms

customer_reviews.title: Just an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats a Magline hand truck. Instructions could have been more informative but all parts were there. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Movers best friend
customer_reviews.text: Made moving a snap. It’s more useful than your buddy with a bad back and penchant for pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Como

customer_reviews.title: Feel the testosterone. Move a piano by yourself. ...
customer_reviews.text: Feel the testosterone. Move a piano by yourself. This is the hand truck for it.
customer_reviews.author: vladamista

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, flexible use hand truck (dolly)
customer_reviews.text: Hardy hand truck used to set up stage equipment. Rolls upright or the bed lays flat for large items. The crew love it. Fair price, very good quality, fast delivery. Would buy again and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Denver gal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was very good quality. I notice all of the delivery truck drivers to our restaurant use it to!
customer_reviews.author: Dan of YouParty

customer_reviews.title: Great handtruck
customer_reviews.text: I was able to move things I never thought possible. I would suggest getting straps for securing the load and a blanket to protect furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good buy.... just gotta keep watching it until the price goes down.
customer_reviews.author: Bladimir

customer_reviews.title: SPEND THE EXTRA MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Costs more than the "throw-away" hand trucks but it is really worth the extra money! Great quality and construction!
customer_reviews.author: Erick P Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: It's a great convertible hand truck that I have purchased several of
customer_reviews.text: It's a great convertible hand truck that I have purchased several of. And I'm sure that this particular cart will last quite a long time.It came packaged well. And it included all of the parts needed for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best out there for commercial use.
customer_reviews.text: If this is going to be used daily its well worth the price. I also have a few similar that do ok but this one is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Instructions  poor at best. leaves lots of questions when trying to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality of unit . appears to be well made. Would have given 5 stars but for poor poor instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Don Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super hard to construct but once you do this thing is a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Osborne

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: These things last for years! We have used other brands but they just don’t hold up in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Busby

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This does everything it says and is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Truck
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty, a little on the difficult side putting it together. Great hand truck, wish it had a brake, gets away from you at times.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Henry

customer_reviews.title: You cant beat the price at any store for this ...
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat the price at any store for this dolly. It is the original and came in original packaging
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Lagunas

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product and operation when unloading at grocery stores
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product and operation when unloading at grocery stores. Might want to think about adding on locking wheels, does tend to roll away without them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: It was missing a wheel. The box it came in was damaged and all taped up clearly it had been opened and possibly a returned item. Very disappointed. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Magliner is worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Magliner is the best. Well built. It's one of those few products that are perfect and worth the extra money
customer_reviews.author: Steve West

customer_reviews.title: This is one great hand cart
customer_reviews.text: This is one great hand cart, to me it is the best, we have moved a lot with it and saved our backs. Rolls great over carpet and old asphalt with heavy loads.
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Parts!
customer_reviews.text: After waiting for this to arrive the wrong handle size was included. Lack of quality control! Whata pain to have to wait to have another one shipped!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was a nightmare but the cart is fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: T-H-E ABSOLUTE WORST assembly instructions in the world but we LOVE the hand truck!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Magliner is the best hand truck you can buy. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and better options available
customer_reviews.text: Really heavy for use in a small business. Get a handcart at 1/10 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Top Rated

customer_reviews.title: Rea all around use hand truck
customer_reviews.text: product has awesome versatility uses easy to transfer from a hand truck to multi 4 wheel transporter
customer_reviews.author: Robert  E

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality and very heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is an animal. Super high quality and very heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Best hand truck
customer_reviews.text: Best hand truck i own. I have 2. They last compared to the cheap ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. But you have to take time to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my craft shows! Easy breakdown and will carry ALOT!
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Clippard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful and easy to use. RECOMMEND 100% TO GOOD FRIEND.
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it..made my job alot easier because I deliver for a living...quality really is great..
customer_reviews.author: Bee Vang

customer_reviews.title: Axle is too short
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck requires some assembly by the purchaser. To mount the tires, 2 large washers and 2 small washers are included. The problem is, the axle provided is too short. With the large washers and small washers in place it is impossible to install the cotter pins.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expectation is great on this product. It deserves full 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Own 10 of them for a delivery business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cart. Worth the money. Definite time saver for anyone who makes deliveries.
customer_reviews.author: R Carney

customer_reviews.title: Complete order
customer_reviews.text: It's very good hand truck I have been using it for long time and still my #1 hand truck, q
customer_reviews.author: basel salha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great, when i have a lot of product that I have to take in.
customer_reviews.author: michael lineberry

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: missing parts, cotter pins, pin coil springs 1/8 in x 1 1/8 in.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Bad Wheeles
customer_reviews.text: Nice hand truck but the tires keep going flat, I purchase this hand truck brand new from Amazon but after 2 weeks the tires went flat and keep doing so. The hand truck is expensive by it self, To purchase additional wheels on top of that is more then I think its worth. Greg Trucking Company
customer_reviews.author: Donna E Young

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered for my business in moving ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered for my business in moving commercial bakery items by the case(s). I have bought another make in the past, but this make seems much more solid......time will tell?
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: This is the king of handtrucks
customer_reviews.text: It is a well made beast and I love it. The wheels are great and it is super sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Hellenic

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good the only thing is I’m not big on the inflatable wheels. If I had my choice I would’ve choosen solid wheels. But all in all it is great
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Holter

product_meta.title: Magliner GMK81UA4 Gemini Sr Convertible Hand Truck, Pneumatic Wheels, 500 lbs Load Capacity, 61" Height, 55-3/4" Length x 21" Width
product_meta.description: Style:Pneumatic WheelsThe Original convertible hand trucks allows driver to make 1 trip versus 5 trips.2 in 1 truck converts from 2 to 4 wheels in seconds. Saves the average delivery person 8 minutes per stop or 8 hours a week. High capacities reduce number of trips per day, increasing productivity. Strong, lightweight construction reduces user fatigue. Modular design means no welds to break, all parts are replaceable for longer product life. Lowers driver fatigue by reducing muscle strain. Optional accessories available to meet all delivery needs. Great for thousands of uses including arts and crafts industry, beverage delivery, corporate offices, food service, hospitals, malls, manufacturing, moving and storage, package delivery, amusement parks, trade shows, universities, vending, video production, medical delivery. 21" Overall width. 12" Frame width. 12" Deck width. 55-3/4" Overall length, 4 wheel. 61" Height, as hand truck. 45-1/8" Height, as platform truck. 51" Platform bed length. 500 lbs Capacity, as hand truck. 1000 lbs Capacity, as platform truck. 10-1/2" Platform height from floor. 10" Standard pneumatic Wheel with red bearing. 5" x 1-1/4" standard swivel Casters with red bearing. 18" x 7-1/2" Nose.
feature_bullets: 2 in 1 truck converts from 2 to 4 wheels in seconds

Dimensions - Overall width: 21" | Frame width: 12" | Deck width 12" | Overall length (4 wheel): 55 - 3/4" | Height (as hand truck): 61" | Height (as platform truck): 45 - 1/8" | Platform bed length: 51" | Platform height from floor: 10 - 1/2" | Nose: 18" x 7 - 1/2"
Maximum Weight - Capacity (as hand truck): 500 lbs | Capacity (as platform truck): 1000 lbs
High capacities reduce number of trips per day, increasing productivity
Strong, lightweight construction reduces user fatigue
Modular design means no welds to break, all parts are replaceable for longer product life
Lowers driver fatigue by reducing muscle strain.Toe Plate Depth: 7.5 inch

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
